mapper.insert: insert into class (class_Name, description, manager_Name, teacher_Name, start_Date, end_Date, classroom_Name) values (#{className}, #{description}, #{managerName}, #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{classroomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT class_no AS classNo, class_name AS className, description, manager_name AS managerName, teacher_name AS teacherName, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, classroom_name AS classroomName, enroll_date AS enrollDate, modified_date AS modifiedDate, class_status AS classStatus FROM class
